forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 47. West southwest wind around 2 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Light Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain between noon and 3pm. Mostly cloudy. High near 56, with temperatures falling to around 54 in the afternoon. South wind 2 to 6 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

weather_report:
As the quiet of the night envelops Downtown San Francisco, a veil of clouds shrouds the city, hinting at the coolness that accompanies this late hour. The temperature sits comfortably around 47 degrees, with only a whisper of a breeze rustling through the urban landscape. Glimpses of the city lights illuminate the streets, creating a soft glow that contrasts beautifully against the dark sky. 

As dawn breaks, expect a day painted mostly in shades of gray, as clouds dominate the scenery. A delicate chance of rain looms in the afternoon, a mere whisper at 20 percent, shyly suggesting that droplets may grace the pavement between noon and three o’clock. With a high near 56, temperatures will gently mitigate to the lower 50s, inviting visitors to dress in layers that offer both warmth and comfort. Perhaps a light jacket or a cozy sweater will suffice as one embarks on an afternoon stroll through the city’s charming streets or finds solace in a quaint café, sipping on a warm drink while watching the world pass by. The serenity of the day, combined with a breath of fresh air, beckons one to explore, take a leisurely walk by the waterfront, or simply bask in the muted beauty of a city that wears its clouds like a soft scarf.
